254394.「やる気 出ないわー。\n お前の顔を彫るって 約束はしたんだけどー。\n やる:
I'm so unmotivated. I promised to carve your
face, but I just can't get motivated.

254395.<cs_pchero>は マカイ・マカロンの箱を\nそっと 差し出した。:
<cs_pchero> kindly offered a box of Makai
Macarons.

254397.「スライムのように 愛らしいフォルム！\n 魔界で 唯一無二の ふわサク感！\n:
As adorable as a Slime! That one-of-a-kind
fluffiness in the Demon World! A sweetness
that will make even Walking Corpses weep...

254398.「ゼクレス王家も御用達 マカイ・マカロン！\n こいつを ワシに くれるってのか:
Makai Macarons! Even sought after by the
Zechres royal family! You're giving these to
me!?

254399.「あ…甘い物とか\n べつに 好きじゃないけど……\n もらっといてやる！:
I-it's not like I like sweets or anything...
but I'll take 'em!

254400.モヒペンコは <cs_pchero>から\nマカイ・マカロンを いそいそと 受け:
Mohipenko eagerly accepted the Makai Macarons
from <cs_pchero>.

254403.「……仕方ねえなー。\n あんだけ硬い 幻獣のツノも 初めてだったし。\n お前:
...I guess it can't be helped. I've never seen
such a hard Beast's Horn before. I'm gonna
carve your face!

254404.「まあ…… それでも \n ここに並ぶ ４人の大魔王に比べたら\n まだまだ ひ:
Well... even so, you're still just a novice
compared to the four Great Demon Kings lined
up here!

254405.「特に ネロドスなんか 本当にいい男だったぜ。\n １０００年前に 死んじまった:
Especially Nerodos, now that was a real man.
He died about 1000 years ago. You're nowhere
near as great as Nerodos...

254407.「この 大ウソつきめ！\n ちょっとばかし強いからって お前ごときが\n 不死の:
You bald-faced liar! Even if you were a little
bit stronger, how could someone like YOU win
against the Immortal Demon King Nerodos!?

254408.「ネロドスの顔を彫ったのは ワシだ。 \n そして ワシは 自分の作品から その:
It was I who carved Nerodos' face into this
mountain. And I can create visions of the
model's past from my works!

254409.「こいつは 本物の ネロドスとちがって \n 不死のチカラこそないが 本物なみに:
This one might not be immortal like the real
Nerodos, but it's every bit as strong as the
real thing.

254410.「お前が ネロドスに勝てるほど\n 強いというなら 証明してみせろ！\n そうす:
If you're really strong enough to beat
Nerodos, then prove it! Only then will I carve
your face!
